body:
Hi there-

I work in the architecture field and I'm interested in just processing the
raw data that radiance generates instead of looking at images that might be
generated.  I want to build my own spatial mapping of illuminance values in
another visualization tool.  Sorry for the newbie question!

How would I do that?  Can anyone lend some hints of where I would look to
see this, files, etc?

Thanks,
CS

subject: [Radiance-general] is there a way to extract image information intext format?
